itunes:title: Hamura's (with Olena Heu)
title: Hamura's (with Olena Heu)
description:
Award-winning journalist and TV personality Olena Heu joins Ron to compare stories of growing up on Kauaʻi and eating the legendary Hamura’s saimin.
